officers.description: The value is applicable exclusively to entities based in the US-CA region.

businessAreas.description: Refers to the geographical region within which a company operates (e.g. New Zealand).

residenceCountry.description: The country where the entity is officially registered.

subClass.description: The sub class of the legal form.

branches.description: Branches or subsidiaries of a company.

shareCapitals.description: The capital contributed by the shareholders.

incorporationDate.description: The date the company was incorporated. This date is same as or earlier than the registration date.

registrationDate.description: The date the company was registered. This date is same as or after the incorporation date.

dissolutionDate.description: The date the company was dissolved.

registerCourt.description: Name of the court where the entity is officially registered.

listed.description: Boolean showing whether the entity is listed on a stock exchange (e.g. y/n).

capitalAmount.description: The funds contributed by owners or investors to start or expand a business.

legalRepresentative.description: The name of the company's legal representative (e.g. China).

ultimateBeneficialOwners-schema.description: The value is available only for enhanced datasets.

name.description: The name of the associated entity in the company.

role.description: The role of the associated entity within the company.

providedRole.description: The role of the associated entity within the company. In original language in cases where it is provided by the Register.

isCorporate.description: Boolean indicating whether the associated entity is a corporate entity.

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of a associated entity.

address.description: The address associated with the associated entity.

startDate.description: The date the associated entity started their role.

endDate.description: The date the associated entity ended their role.

status.description: The status of a beneficial owner, which typically refers to their relationship with an entity or asset.

sharePercentage.description: The percentage of the share compared to the total.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the associated entity.

nationality.description: The nationality of the associated entity.

identityDocument.description: The identity document of the associated entity.

personalId.description: The personalId of the associated entity.

residenceCountry.description: The residence country of the associated entity.

name.description: This field indicates the full name of the Beneficial owner. It should always be provided.

gender.description: Gives the gender of the beneifical owner. Can take 2 values : F for Female or M for Male. Can be empty.

dateOfBirth.description: Gives the brithdate of the beneficial owner if available, can be complete (DD/MM/YYYY) or not (MM/YYYY or YYYY).

address.description: Gives the address of the Beneficial owner intermediary. This field includes the street, the number of the building where the entity is located and the number of the floor of the building if available.

country.description: Gives the country of the Beneficial owner intermediary.

distance.description: Gives the distance between the concerned entity (Beneficial owner intermediaries) and its Benefecial owner. If the distance is 4, it means that the BOI is the fourth entity in the path to the BO.

informationDate.description: Date when the link between the shareholder and the company just below in the BO path has been confirmed. Date format is MM/YYYY.

name.description: This field indicates the full name of the Beneficial owner. It should always be provided.

gender.description: Gives the gender of the beneifical owner. Can take 2 values : F for Female or M for Male. Can be empty.

dateOfBirth.description: Gives the brithdate of the beneficial owner if available, can be complete (DD/MM/YYYY) or not (MM/YYYY or YYYY).

address.description: Gives the address of the Beneficial owner intermediary. This field includes the street, the number of the building where the entity is located and the number of the floor of the building if available.

country.description: Gives the country of the Beneficial owner intermediary.

distance.description: Gives the distance between the concerned entity (Beneficial owner intermediaries) and its Benefecial owner. If the distance is 4, it means that the BOI is the fourth entity in the path to the BO.

informationDate.description: Date when the link between the shareholder and the company just below in the BO path has been confirmed. Date format is MM/YYYY.

state.description: This is the specific state being represented in the United States.

providedStatus.description: The legal status of the company. In original language in cases where it is provided by the register.

legalForm.description: The legal form of the company. In original language in cases where it is provided by the Register.

standardisedLegalForm.description: The standardised version of the company's national legal form.

entityType.description: Entities are given a 'type' according to the classification.

englishNames.description: The name of the company in English, if different from the official name.

alsoKnownAs.description: Any other names the company is known as.

previousNames.description: Any previous name of the company.

incorporationDate.description: The date the company was incorporated. This date is same as or earlier than the registration date.

registrationDate.description: The date the company was registered. This date is same as or after the incorporation date.

dissolutionDate.description: The date the company was dissolved

registrationAuthority.description: The name of the authority that registered the company.

watchlist.description: Boolean that indicates whether the entity has been flagged as appearing on a Watchlist.

pep.description: Boolean that indicates whether the entity has been flagged as a Politically Exposed Person.

adverseMedia.description: Boolean that indicates whether the entity has been flagged as appearing in Adverse Media.

formattedAddress-schema.title: formattedAddress
formattedAddress-schema.description: Object providing address representation in a standardized way, with all properties optional and subject to variation across jurisdictions, accommodating global address formats.

careOf.description: The addressee of the entity's address.

number.description: The number of the entity's address.

box.description: The box of the entity's address.

poBox.description: The poBox of the entity's address.

addressLine1.description: The addressLine1 of the entity's address.

addressLine2.description: The addressLine2 of the entity's address.

street.description: The street of the entity's address.

postCode.description: The postcode of the entity's address.

zip.description: ZIP code of the entity's  address.

district.description: The district of the entity's address.

city.description: The city of the entity's address.

prefecture.description: The prefecture of the entity's address.

region.description: The region of the entity's address.

state.description: The State in which an entities address is located, when it is located in the United States;

country.description: The ISO code of the country  of the entity's address, according the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard.

countryCode.description: Country code of the address provided by jurisdiction.

extra.description: The extra information of the entity's address.

addon.description: Additional line specifying the department, office, or unit number within a larger complex or building.

endDate.description: The end date of the entity's address.

shareCapitals.description: The capital contributed by the shareholder. Depending on what the source is providing, the list can have more or less properties (available in Australia)

sharePercentage.description: The percentage of the share compared to the total.

role.description: The role of the joint shareholders within the company.

issuedDate.description: The date of the LEI assignment, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

renewalDate.description: The date of the LEI annual renewal, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

leiStatus.description: The LEI status, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

name.description: The name of the associated entity in the company.

membershipDate.description: The date the officer started the membership.

role.description: The role of the associated entity within the company.

isCorporate.description: Boolean indicating whether the associated entity is a corporate entity.

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of a associated entity.

address.description: The address associated with the associated entity.

startDate.description: The date the associated entity started their role.

issuedDate.description: The date of the LEI assignment, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

renewalDate.description: The date of the LEI annual renewal, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

leiStatus.description: The LEI status, the field is only visible if the identifierName is LEI.

dateOfLicense.description: It is a specific date on which a business was officially granted its operating license or permit by the relevant regulatory authority.

nextDueDate.description: Indicates the future date up to which the next set of financial statements will be prepared.

madeUpDate.description: Indicates the most recent date for which the company's financial statements have been prepared.

lastAnnouncementDate.description: Refers to the most recent date on which the company made an official announcement or filing to the registry.

authorizedCapital.description: Refers to the maximum amount of share capital that a company is legally allowed to issue to shareholders, as specified in its corporate charter or articles of incorporation.

asic.description: Refers to a unique identifier assigned by the Australian Securities & Investments Commission to a company or business entity for regulatory and identification purposes.

abn.description: Refers to a unique 11-digit identifier issued by the Australian Business Register to all businesses in Australia for taxation and other business-related activities.

code.description: Indicates the prefix used in Cyprus company registration number.

pesel.description: Refers to a unique 11-digit national identification number assigned to individuals for use in governmental, administrative, and business registry processes, not directly applicable to businesses but to individuals, including sole proprietors.

regon.description: REGON (Regionalny Ewidencji Gospodarczej) is a 9-digit identification number used in Poland to register legal entities and individuals and their activities.

siretNumber.description: Refers to a 14-digit code used to uniquely identify each physical location of a business for administrative and regulatory purposes within the national business registry.

isHeadquarter.description: Refers to a boolean value, when true, signifies the company entry represents the main office or central headquarters, and when false, indicates the entry is not the headquarters but rather a branch or subsidiary location.

exchange.description: Refers to a marketplace where securities, such as stocks and bonds, are bought and sold, and the term is used to categorize and identify the specific trading platform on which a company's securities are listed.

jurisdiction.description: Specifies the state in which a company was initially incorporated or legally established.

residency.description: Refers to classification of a company based on its primary location of operation or incorporation within the country. Possible values are domestic or foreign.

fiscalYearEnd.description: Indicates the date marking the end of a company's accounting year, upon which its annual financial reports are based.

insiderTransactionForOwnerExists.description: Signifies whether there have been any financial transactions involving the company's stock conducted by its executives, directors, or significant shareholders.

insiderTransactionForIssuerExists.description: Indicates whether there have been any reported transactions involving the company's securities carried out by insiders, such as executives or major shareholders, on behalf of the company itself.

category.description: Describes the classification of the latest set of financial statements, e.g., 'dormant' indicates no significant accounting transactions.

stateOfIncorporationDescription.description: Refers to the text detailing the specific U.S. state under whose laws the company is registered or incorporated.

entityType.description: Entities are given a 'type' according to the following classification: Insurance company, NULL, Private equity firm, Venture capital, Public authority/State/Government, Financial company, Hedge fund, Foundation/Research institute, Bank, Corporate, Mutual and pension fund/Nominee/Trust/Trustee, Marine vessels, Small company, Medium sized company, Very large company

businessLicences.description: Refers to the official permits or licenses a company holds, indicating the range or scope of activities it is legally authorized to conduct.

signatoryRights.description: Authority granted to an individual to enter into contracts on behalf of a legal entity.

numberOfShares.description: The number of shares owned by the shareholder.

shareType.description: The type of share owned by the shareholder.

percentage.description: The percentage of shares owned by the shareholder.

isBeneficiallyOwned.description: Boolean indicating whether the shares are beneficially owned.

sharePercentage.description: The total share percentage owned by the shareholder in the subject entity.

sharePercentageRange.description: The range of share percentage owned by the shareholder as recorded in the Register.

sharePercentageDirect.description: The direct share percentage owned by the shareholder.

sharePercentageTotal.description: The total share percentage owned by the shareholder in the subject entity.

primary.description: If the source is considered as the main provider of the particular country or service.

fields.description: List of the fields that have been populated of the particular source. Star (*) stands for all the fields, except the ones that are listed up for other fields.

lastCheckedTime.description: The certain point of time when the data was last time checked against the source (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

scopeOfBusiness.description: Refers to the range of activities and operations that a company is authorized to conduct, as defined in its registration documents.

interruption.description: Refers to a temporary halt or disruption in the company's authorized activities, as recorded in the registry.

otherNames.description: Alternate or previously used names of the branch.

number.description: The unique identifier or number assigned to the branch.

providedStatus.description: The status of the branch as provided by the Register.

vat.description: The value-added tax (VAT) registration number of the branch.

shareCapital.description: The amount of share capital registered for the branch.

dissolutionDate.description: The date of dissolution of the branch.

tradingAddress.description: The trading address of the company.

overdue.description: A general boolean value indicating if any required filings are past their submission deadline (false means nothing is overdue).

referenceDate.description: Specifies the annual date by which a business must prepare its financial statements.

changeId.description: Id of a change for a monitor.

monitorChangeTypes.description: Type of the monitor (e.g. status, address).
Array of the desired change types for the monitoring service.

datasetName.description: The dataset you want to monitor. Defaults to refresh.

frequency.description: The optional desired frequency (in days) for the monitoring service. Defaults to 7.

created.description: Datetime when the monitor was created (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

deleted.description: Datetime when the monitor was deleted (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

lastCallbackTime.description: Datetime when a call back for that monitor was last sent to the user (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

changeCount.description: The number of times a change has been detected for this entity since the monitor was created.

monitorChangeTypes.description: The desired change types for the monitoring service in a format of array of string(s).

changes.description: The history of changes for the entity.

monitorStatus.description: The status of the monitor. Possible values are PENDING, CREATED, FIRED, DELETED.

datasetName.description: The type of dataset to be monitored (e.g. REFRESH, ENHANCED, LEV).

frequency.description: The frequency in dates how this monitor will be updated.

productName.description: The name of the requested product.

productDescription.description: The description of the requested product.
productDescription.example: Current company information from the official primary source retrieved in real-time

requiresOption.description: Boolean field that shows if the order of the product needs a productOptionId.

availability.description: Boolean field that shows if the product is available.

availabilityCheckStatus.description: The availability status which shows that availability is completed with or without an error.

priority.description: Priority of order. Possible values are standard and express.

kompanyId.description: Unique id of company element in subject. Static for a company for the lifetime. (Not required if registrationNumber or companyName is given)

registrationNumber.description: Registration number of a company preceeded by the country code. (Not required if kompanyId or companyName is given)

companyName.description: Name of the company for which a document should be ordered. (Not required if kompanyId or registrationNumber is given)

generalData.description: Boolean parameter if generalData is requested.

financialData.description: Boolean parameter if financialData is requested.

historicalData.description: Boolean parameter if historicalData is requested.

locationInvestigation.description: Boolean parameter if locationInvestigation is requested.

costConfirmation.description: Boolean parameter if costConfirmation is requested.

informationRequirements.description: Accurate description of the required company information and document type(s).

contactEmail.description: Contact email address to be used when application level cost limit has been reached.

contactPhone.description: Contact phone to be used when application level cost limit has been reached.

strategy.description: Matching strategy. FULL:means all nodes in the tree are in scope of the crawl, LEVELS means only nodes fulfilling the levels thresholds specified are in scope.

levels.description: Threshold for different levels of crawling.

threshold.title: threshold
threshold.description: A threshold for ultimate percentage of ownership for UBOs. Default when unspecified; all discovered UBOs will be included.

includeDocs.description: Parameter to or not to include the purchase of individual register documents. Default when unspecified; false.

monitor.description: Include the monitoring of all discovered corporate nodes for some of the supported jurisdictions. Default when unspecified; false (e.g. false/true).

createUpdateRequest-schema.description: Update order with an action and oderId to release fund [resume] or abort.

action.description: Please select from RESUME or ABORT.

businessConciergeOrderResponse-schema.description: Response structure of the business concierge order.

mimeTypes.description: The document type of the requested product, value needs to be passed to the header/accept field when retrieving the content (e.g. application/json).

orderDeliveryTime.description: The time the order was delivered (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

language.description: Requested language code of the dataset.
Requested language code of the dataset.

landRegisterOrderResponse-schema.title: landRegisterOrderResponse
landRegisterOrderResponse-schema.description: Response structure of the landregister order.

mimeTypes.description: The document type of the requested product, value needs to be passed to the header/accept field when retrieving the content (e.g. application/json).

orderDeliveryTime.description: The time the order was delivered (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

mimeTypes.description: The document type of the requested product, value needs to be passed to the header/accept field when retrieving the content (e.g. application/json).

orderDeliveryTime.description: The time the order was delivered (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

mimeTypes.description: The document type of the requested product, value needs to be passed to the header/accept field when retrieving the content (e.g. application/json).

orderDeliveryTime.description: The time the order was delivered (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

strategy.description: Matching strategy. FULL:means all nodes in the tree are in scope of the crawl, LEVELS means only nodes fulfilling the levels thresholds specified are in scope.

levels.description: Threshold for different levels of crawling.

threshold.title: threshold
threshold.description: A threshold for ultimate percentage of ownership for UBOs. Default when unspecified; all discovered UBOs will be included.

includeDocs.description: Parameter to or not to include the purchase of individual register documents. Default when unspecified; false.

monitor.description: Include the monitoring of all discovered corporate nodes for some of the supported jurisdictions. Default when unspecified; false (e.g. false/true).

uboOrderResponse-schema.title: uboOrderResponse
uboOrderResponse-schema.description: Response structure of the ubo order.

mimeTypes.description: The document type of the requested product, value needs to be passed to the header/accept field when retrieving the content (e.g. application/json).

orderDeliveryTime.description: The time the order was delivered (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

kompanyId-schema.title: Kompany ID
kompanyId-schema.description: Unique id of company element in subject. Static for a company for the lifetime.

datasetName-schema.title: Dataset Name
datasetName-schema.description: The type of dataset. (e.g. REFRESH, LEV, INDEX)

countryCode-schema.title: Country Code
countryCode-schema.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

language-schema.title: Language
language-schema.description: Language of the dataset (e.g. OG, EN, FR).

status-schema.title: Status
status-schema.description: The dataset list query status. PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED, DELAYED  or DENIED_NOT_AVAILABLE.

searchMethod-schema.title: Search Method
searchMethod-schema.description: The type of search (e.g. NAME, NUMBER).

productType-schema.title: Product Type
productType-schema.description: Type of requested document. For the list of available types please refer to the documentation.

startDate-schema.title: Start Date
startDate-schema.description: Filter for list items regarding the start date for retrieving documents (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD).

endDate-schema.title: End Date
endDate-schema.description: Filter for list items regarding the end date for retrieving documents (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD).

requestTimeFrom-schema.title: Request Time From
requestTimeFrom-schema.description: Filter for list items regarding the start time of the original request (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

requestTimeTo-schema.title: Request Time To
requestTimeTo-schema.description: Filter for list items regarding the end time of the original request (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

requestTime-schema.title: Request Time
requestTime-schema.description: Datetime when the request reaches the endpoint (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

responseTime-schema.title: Response Time
responseTime-schema.description: Datetime when the response is sent to the consumer (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

estimatedDeliverySeconds-schema.title: Estimated Delivery in Seconds
estimatedDeliverySeconds-schema.description: Estimated delivery time in seconds. The field is 0 when no estimation can be given like on Business Concierge Service.

productOptionId-schema.title: Product Option ID
productOptionId-schema.description: Unique id to refer to the document when ordering a product.

productName-schema.title: Product Name
productName-schema.description: The name of the referred product.

productDescription-schema.title: Product Description
productDescription-schema.description: The description of the requested product.
productDescription-schema.example: Current company information from the official primary source retrieved in real-time

productCategory-schema.title: Product Category
productCategory-schema.description: The type of the requested product.

idSearchResponse-schema.title: idSearchResponse
idSearchResponse-schema.description: response structure of the idSearch method

searchMethod.description: Search method used to find the results.

searchValue.description: Search value parameter, either bvdId, orbisId, kompanyId or CountryCode/RegistrationNumber.

registrationNumber.description: Registration number of a company preceded by the country code.

lastCheckedTime.description: The certain point of time when the data was last checked against the source (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

monitorChangeTypes.description: Required change types for the monitoring service in a format of array of string(s).

legalType.description: Legal type of the entity as provided by the source.

searchMethod.description: The type of search (e.g. NAME, EINNUMBER).

zip.description: Optional ZIP code parameter to improve results. (ZIP is preferred over countryCode).

strictSearch.description: Optional parameter to do tight matching. (Only the best match will be returned rather than the top 5).

searchMethod.description: The type of search (e.g. NAME, EINNUMBER).

zip.description: Optional ZIP code parameter to improve results. (ZIP is preferred over countryCode).

strictSearch.description: Boolean parameter for wider range of results.

isValid.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

name.description: This represents the name of the company.

ein.description: Employer Identification Number (EIN), a unique identifier assigned by the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) to businesses in the United States.

irsScore.description: It can span from A (100% match) to C (EIN is not in the IRS database).

irsScoreExplanation.description: It provides an explanation based on data gathered through the US Internal Revenue Service.

dbaScoreExplanation.description: It provides the information if a company name is not the legal name for the business (DBA = Doing Business As).

companyScore.description: In case is 100, it implies that the record appears 100% of the times.

companyScoreExplanation.description: It indicates the frequency of appearance of the record under the associated EIN.

providedStatus.description: It can span from A (verified and NCOA Plus 4) to F (bad address and should not be mailed to).

providedStatusExplanation.description: It indicates if the provided address has been verified and can be used for mailing.

confidenceScore.description: It can span from A (best match) to F (lowest scores).

confidenceScoreExplanation.description: It indicates the best match, if multiple records are returned.

address.description: This is an array representing the company's address.

searchMethod.description: The type of search (e.g. BASIC, COMPREHENSIVE).
The type of search (e.g. BASIC, COMPREHENSIVE).

isValid.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

bankCode.description: This is the Bank Identifier Code (BIC) or SWIFT code.

bankName.description: This parameter represents the official name of the bank.

bankId.description: This is a unique identifier for the bank.

bankAddress.description: This is the physical address of the bank.

sepaCredit.description: Boolean parameter if the bank supports SEPA credit transfers.

sepaDebit.description: Boolean parameter if the bank supports SEPA direct debits.

sepaB2b.description: Boolean parameter if the bank supports SEPA B2B (business-to-business) direct debits.

sepaCards.description: Boolean parameter if the bank supports SEPA card payments.

isinListing-schema.title: isinListing
isinListing-schema.description: Response schema of isin verification search result listing.

identifier.description: This is a unique identifier for a security.

name.description: The official name of the security.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol under which the security is traded on the exchange.

exchangeCode.description: The code of the exchange where the security is traded.

securityType.description: This field describes the type of the security.

marketSector.description: The sector of the market in which the security is traded.

shareClassId.description: This is a unique identifier for a specific class of shares if the company has multiple share classes.

additionalSecurityType.description: This field describes the type of the security.

isin.description: Unique 12-character alphanumeric code identifying an International Securities Identification Number.
International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) as search value.
International Securities Identification Number (ISIN) as search value.

isValid.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

isinSearchResult-schema.title: isinSearchResult
isinSearchResult-schema.description: Response schema of isin verification search result.

searchMethod.description: Type of identification number, most frequently LEI.

searchValue.description: The search string, a lei number.

isinPageNumber.description: Pagination setting for ISIN list, number of the page.

isinPageSize.description: Pagination setting for ISIN list, number of items in the result set.

validationStatus.description: Confirmation if IRS match has been found.

matchStatus.description: Confirmation if EIN match has been found.

possibleMatch.description: The name of the possible matching entity.

searchMethod.description: The type of search (e.g. tinNumberBasic, tinNumberComprehensive).

name.description: The name of the referred entity.

searchMethod.description: The type of search (e.g. tinNumberBasic, tinNumberComprehensive).

name.description: The name of the referred entity.

isValidTin.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

isValidEin.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

requestTime.description: Datetime when the request reaches the endpoint (ISO 8601 format of YYYY MM- DDThh:mm:ssZ).

responseTime.description: Datetime when the response is sent to the consumer (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

name.description: The name of the referred company.

countryCode.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

addConfirmation.description: Indicates if a PDF document with the results has been requested.

countryCode.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

name.description: The name of the referred entity.

addConfirmation.description: Indicates if a PDF document with the results has been requested.

isValid.description: Gives the confirmation if the requested identifier is valid.

requestTime.description: Datetime when the request reaches the endpoint (ISO 8601 format of YYYY MM- DDThh:mm:ssZ).

responseTime.description: Datetime when the response is sent to the consumer (ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

kompanyId.description: Unique id of company element in subject. Static for a company for the lifetime.

registrationNumber.description: Unique number of the referred entity.

name.description: The name of the referred entity.

address.description: The address of the referred entity.

countryCode.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

state.description: Specific state being represented in the United States of America.

continent.description: Continent on which the country is located (e.g. Europe, Asia, North America, Africa, Oceania, South America).

countryConnectionType.description: The type of connection to the country's data sources (e.g. Live, Live - Regular Updates, Business Concierge, Discontinued, Not Covered Yet).

updateFrequency.description: Frequency of the data when the countryConnectionType is 'LIVE - Regular Updates' (e.g. Weekly, Monthly).

status.description: Overall status of services for the country.

sources.description: List of data sources providing data for the country.

datasets.description: List of available datasets available for the country.

searches.description: List of available searches related to the country.

products.description: List of available documents related to the country.

otherServices.description: List of other services available for the country.

conciergeProducts.description: List of available business concierge products.

productOriginalName.description: Name of the referred product in original language.

productCategory.description: Category describing the nature of the product.

countryCode.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

priceTier.description: Categorization of the price range in tiers.

relatedProductType.description: Unique identifier of the related product.

sourceId.description: Unique identifier of the source providing this product.

sourceNameLong.description: A longer, more descriptive name of the source.

isPrimarySource.description: Indicates whether the source is the primary data source in terms of coverage.

sourceStatus.description: The current status of the source.

sourceConnectionType.description: The type of connection to the source (e.g. Live, Live - Regular Updates, Business Concierge, Discontinued, Not Covered Yet).

kompanyId-parameter.name: kompanyId
kompanyId-parameter.description: Unique id of entity, static for the lifetime.

countryCode-parameter.name: countryCode
countryCode-parameter.description: 2 or 5-digit code for the country (e.g. AT, US-DE).

offset-parameter.name: offset
offset-parameter.description: The starting point of the results.

status-parameter.name: status
status-parameter.description: The status of the current resource (PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED, DELAYED, DENIED-NOT-AVAILABLE).

productType-parameter.name: productType
productType-parameter.description: Type of requested document. For the list of available types please refer to the documentation.

startDate-parameter.name: startDate
startDate-parameter.description: Filter for list items regarding the start date for retrieving documents (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD). This parameter only works when productType is DOCOFSEUS.

endDate-parameter.name: endDate
endDate-parameter.description: Filter for list items regarding the end date for retrieving documents (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DD). This parameter only works when productType is DOCOFSEUS.

addPdfExtract-parameter.name: addPdfExtract
addPdfExtract-parameter.description: Boolean parameter to generate a PDF.

addProductRegisterReport-parameter.name: addProductRegisterReport
addProductRegisterReport-parameter.description: Boolean parameter to get Product Register Report.

requestTimeFrom-parameter.name: requestTimeFrom
requestTimeFrom-parameter.description: Filter for list items regarding the start time of the original request (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).

requestTimeTo-parameter.name: requestTimeTo
requestTimeTo-parameter.description: Filter for list items regarding the end time of the original request (e.g. ISO 8601 format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ).
